review:
Found the doctor very lazy to answer questions and also not very interested. Not at all comforting as I took my newborn. Also he prescribed medication for newborn which made my daughter all the more uncomfortable.

Will not recommend this doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor just spent 30 seconds with patient and quick to recommend another doctor for surgery. That means you Keep on paying consulting fees to each doctor they keep on referring within Aster Hospital premises. ****** ***** *** **** ******* ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: After my wife waited for a long 35 minutes and informed the doctor that we were waiting outside, then the doctor saw our baby and was not explaining health problems properly. And his explanation seems to be not very convincing also. Importantly he asked us to admit our baby in the hospital on an emergency basis without concrete explanations.
